name: WebAudio

unions.name: NodeId
unions.comment: Unique identifier of audio nodes in the audio graph.

unions.name: Props
cases: { fftSize : Basics.Int, minDecibels : Basics.Float, maxDecibels : Basics.Float, smoothingTimeConstant : Basics.Float }
{ buffer : WebAudio.Url, startTime : WebAudio.Time, stopTime : Maybe.Maybe WebAudio.Time, detune : Basics.Int }
{ type_ : WebAudio.BiquadFilterType, frequency : WebAudio.Param, detune : WebAudio.Param, q : WebAudio.Param }
{ frequency : WebAudio.Param, startTime : WebAudio.Time, stopTime : WebAudio.Time }

{ coneInnerAngle : Basics.Float, coneOuterAngle : Basics.Float, coneOuterGain : Basics.Float, distanceModel : WebAudio.DistanceModel, orientationX : WebAudio.Param, orientationY : WebAudio.Param, orientationZ : WebAudio.Param, panningModel : WebAudio.PanningModel, positionX : WebAudio.Param, positionY : WebAudio.Param, positionZ : WebAudio.Param, maxDistance : Basics.Float, refDistance : Basics.Float, rolloffFactor : Basics.Float }

unions.name: Url
unions.comment:
URL for an audio buffer.

Elm can't deal `AudioBuffer` objects directly
and use URL instead of `AudioBuffer`.

aliases.name: DynamicsCompressorProps
aliases.type: { attack : WebAudio.Param, knee : WebAudio.Param, ratio : WebAudio.Param, release : WebAudio.Param, threshold : WebAudio.Param }

aliases.name: Node
aliases.type: { id : WebAudio.NodeId, output : WebAudio.Output, props : WebAudio.Props }

values.name: output
values.comment: Special identifier representing final destination. This is just a `Output (NodeId "output")`.

values.name: parallel
values.type: WebAudio.NodeId -> WebAudio.Output -> WebAudio.Props -> List.List WebAudio.Props -> List.List WebAudio.Node

values.name: serial
values.type: WebAudio.NodeId -> WebAudio.Output -> List.List WebAudio.Props -> List.List WebAudio.Node

values.name: toHtml
values.comment:
Render an audio graph as HTML.

NOTE: Each audio nodes should have unique id. If two nodes have the same id, the second node overwrites the first node.
values.type: { graph : WebAudio.Graph, assets : List.List String.String, onTick : Basics.Float -> msg, onProgress : List.List String.String -> msg } -> Html.Html msg
